A.name: Aartsstralend Licht
A.description: A powerful light that can dazzle enemies.

A.name: Aartszondenstraal
A.description: A ray of dark energy that damages and weakens foes.

A.name: Afkeer
A.description: A protective spell that repels enemies.

A.name: Afsnijden
A.description: A spell to sever connections or bonds.

A.name: Aardschok
A.description: A mighty earthquake that shakes the ground.

A.name: Aarden Vuist
A.description: A spell that creates a powerful earthen fist to strike opponents.

A.name: Afscheidszegen
A.description: A blessing for those leaving on a journey.

A.name: Aarzelende Aanraking
A.description: A touch that makes enemies hesitate and falter.

A.name: Allerbeste Onzichtbaarheid
A.description: A highly effective invisibility spell.

A.name: Afstraffing
A.description: A spell that punishes a foe with necrotic damage.

A.name: Aardverschuiving
A.description: A spell that causes the earth to shift and alter its shape.

A.name: Afschuw
A.description: A terrifying illusion that causes fear in nearby creatures.

A.name: Aanschrijven
A.description: A spell that curses an individual with negative effects.

A.name: Afweermagie
A.description: A protective shield against magical effects.

A.name: Astrale Projectie
A.description: Allows the caster's spirit to leave their body and travel in the astral plane.

A.name: Afschrikking
A.description: A spell that instills fear in a target, causing them to flee.

A.name: Afschuwelijke Vlammen
A.description: A burst of destructive fire that burns everything in its path.

A.name: Afstoten
A.description: A push spell that repels creatures away from the caster.

A.name: Aasfout
A.description: A necromantic curse that causes severe corruption.

A.name: Amulet van Bescherming
A.description: A protective amulet that defends against harm.

A.name: Afweermagie
A.description: A spell that defends against incoming attacks.

A.name: Afschrikking
A.description: A spell that causes fear in a target.

A.name: Afscherming
A.description: A spell that provides a protective shield against damage.

B.name: Blaast
B.description: A small gust of wind that can push or move objects.

B.name: Brandend Handen
B.description: A spell that creates a burning sensation in the hands.

B.name: Bliksemstraal
B.description: A lightning bolt that strikes a target with intense force.

B.name: Blink
B.description: A spell that allows the caster to blink short distances.

B.name: Beroering
B.description: A spell that creates a disruptive force in the air.

B.name: Bendigeer
B.description: A spell that bends the will of a target, making them obey commands.

B.name: Bestraling
B.description: A radiant beam of energy that damages enemies.

B.name: Bescherming tegen Kwaad en Goed
B.description: A protective spell that shields against evil and good forces.

B.name: Betovering
B.description: A charm that makes a target more susceptible to influence.

B.name: Blinde Vlekken
B.description: A spell that creates blind spots in the target's perception.

B.name: Bezieling
B.description: A necromantic spell that invigorates the spirit of the dead.
